pos: noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru
noun or participle which takes the aux. verb suru

lessons.japanese: 君はその救済事業の資金を集めなければならない。
lessons.english: You have to raise funds for the relief work.

lessons.japanese: その老人は貧民救済に多額の金を寄付した。
lessons.english: The old man contributed a large sum of money to the poor.

lessons.japanese: 彼らは難民救済の資金を集めている。
lessons.english: They are appealing for money to help refugees.

lessons.japanese: 彼らは難民救済の資金を求めている。
lessons.english: They are appealing for money to help refugees.

lessons.japanese: 彼は貧民救済に多額のお金を寄付した。
lessons.english: He contributed much money to relieving the poor.

lessons.japanese: 彼は難民救済基金に１万ドルを寄付した。
lessons.english: He donated $10000 to the refugee fund.

lessons.japanese: 彼は難民救済基金に１万ドルを寄付した。
lessons.english: He donated $10,000 to the refugee fund.

lessons.japanese: 彼は自分の全生涯を貧しい人々の救済に捧げた。
lessons.english: He dedicated his whole life to helping poor people.

lessons.japanese: 難民達の苦しみを救済すべきだ。
lessons.english: We must relieve the refugees of their suffering.

lessons.japanese: 君はその救済事業の資金を集めなければならない。
lessons.english: You have to raise funds for the relief work.

lessons.japanese: その老人は貧民救済に多額の金を寄付した。
lessons.english: The old man contributed a large sum of money to the poor.

lessons.english: We must relieve the refugees of their suffering.

lessons.english: He dedicated his whole life to helping poor people.

lessons.english: He donated $10000 to the refugee fund.
